snatools 0.0.0.9000

Reference

snatools

snatools

snatools: An R toolkit to bridge graph classes and streamline network analytic workflows.

Class Conversion

Safely convert objects between graph classes.

as_igraph() as.igraph.network()

Conversion to igraph objects.

as_network() as.network.igraph()

Conversion to network objects.

Vertices

Routines targeting vertices and their attributes.

vrt_as_df()

Extract vertex attributes as a data frame.

vrt_attr_names()

Get Vertex Attribute Names

vrt_get_attr()

Get a Vertex Attribute

vrt_get_names()

Get Vertex Names

Edges

Routines targeting edges and their attributes.

edg_as_df()

Extract edge attributes as a data frame.

edg_attr_names()

Get Edge Attribute Names

edg_get_attr()

Get a Specific Edge Attribute

Structural Metadata

Routines targeting structural graph metadata.

net_is_directed()

Is a Graph Directed?

net_is_multiplex()

Is a Graph Multiplex?

net_is_bipartite()

Is a Graph Bipartite?

net_count_vertices()

How Many Vertices Does a Graph Have?

net_count_edges()

How Many Edges Does a Graph Have?

net_count_actors()

How Many Vertices Belong to a Bipartite Graph's Actor Mode?

net_has_loops()

Does a Graph Have Loops?

net_has_isolates()

Does a Graph Have Isolates?

Representations

Construct various network representations.

rep_as_edgelist()

Construct a graph object's edgelist representation.
